resources.string: Tilt your device to turn the runner
The screen is split into two halves, Left and Right
Interacting with the left side of the screen controls your weapons
Touch the left side of the screen to fire your Pulse Laser
The Pulse Laser serves as your primary weapon
Swipe right to equip the Vampire Beam
Touch and hold the left side of the screen to fire the Vampire Beam
The Vampire Beam channels energy from a target directly to the runner, although does very little damage"
Swipe up to equip Homing Rockets
Press and hold to create Homing Rockets, Release to fire
Rockets will automatically lock-on to the closest target
Flares are used to evade incoming missiles
Flares will be covered later in the tutorial
Swipe left to re-equip the Pulse Laser
Interacting with the right side of the screen performs manoeuvres
Press and hold the right side of the screen to boost
Swipe left or right to dodge
Rapidly swipe left twice to strafe left
Rapidly swipe right twice to strafe right
Swipe up to continue moving forward
The grid of cells underneath the runner is a radar
The coloured cell in the center represents you
Other cells of the same colour represent allies
While other lit cells represent enemies
Use the radar to find and destroy the training dummies
The bar at the top of the screen represents your remaining energy
Once this bar has emptied your runner will be destroyed
Being hit by enemy attacks will also drain energy
Energy can be replenished by destroying enemies or by using the Vampire Beam
Destroy the training dummies before your energy drains completely
At the start of the game you will spawn with two wingmen
Enemies destroyed by your wingmen will recharge energy and award points as normal
With the help of your wingmen destroy all training dummies
If your energy drains entirely your runner will be destroyed
After being destroyed there is a short period of time where the runner can reboot
If an enemy is destroyed by yourself or by one of your wingmen you will reboot
Hey it looks like this is your first time playing ProtoRunner V2.
After watching all my friends play I came to the conclusion that we really need a tutorial
It takes 5 minutes and you will have much more fun if you know what you\'re doing.
Do you want to play the tutorial?
You must sign in with your google play account to access the leaderboards. Would you like to sign in?
